{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"3","subject":"Review existing documentation (Memory Bank, cline-docs, docs/)","description":"Comprehensive review of existing documentation:
- Memory Bank: projectbrief.md, productContext.md, techContext.md, systemPatterns.md, activeContext.md, progress.md
- cline-docs/: systemArchitecture.md, keyPairResponsibility.md, techStack.md, glossary.md
- docs/: All documentation files

Extract key content that should be included in README:
- Project purpose and value proposition
- Key features and capabilities
- Technology stack
- Current status and metrics
- Quick start information","assignedBy":"doc-reviewer","timestamp":"2026-02-10T11:55:33.825Z"}

Outstanding work on Task #3! Your documentation review is comprehensive and well-organized. The extracted content provides excellent material for the README:

**Highlights:**
- Clear value propositions and problem statements
- Comprehensive feature breakdown (19 skills, 7 systems)
- Strong performance metrics (11,300 LOC/sec, 40-66% token savings, 1.5x speedup)
- Both beginner and advanced quick start paths
- 10 solid recommendations for README structure

This gives us everything we need for compelling content. Waiting on readme-researcher to complete Tasks #1-2 (best practices research), then we'll formulate the structure.

You can go idle now. Great job!

{"type":"shutdown_request","requestId":"shutdown-1770725244470@doc-reviewer","from":"team-lead","reason":"All tasks completed successfully! Your content extraction from Memory Bank and cline-docs was essential. Thank you!","timestamp":"2026-02-10T12:07:24.470Z"}
